Title: The Two of Us
Actors: Emmanuel Nkosinathi Gweva, Busisiwe Mtshali, Mpho Modikoane, Thato Dhladla
Plot: Set in Alexandra township, South Africa, a brother and sister journey through life knowing they have no one but each other. Schoolgirl Zanele falls in love with an older man where a series of events are set in motion and reveal much more.
